tool_description: Get the yiwugo.com(义乌购) products'  information

api_list.name: search products
api_list.description:
search products

search shops by keyword.

api_list.name: get product detail
api_list.description:
get product detail by item_id,
The source of the data can be controlled through the 'lan' field (en: English website, cn: Chinese website)
